languages.text: "Стреляют — часто... на знатных господ нападают не часто... Только если не анверы. Эти очень злые, недели не проходит, чтоб они кого-то не убили и не выпотрошили. Ер-ретики страшные, ничего не чтят, ник-каких порядков!"

"Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"
languages.original_text: "Стреляют — часто... на знатных господ нападают не часто... Только если не анверы. Эти очень злые, недели не проходит, чтоб они кого-то не убили и не выпотрошили. Ер-ретики страшные, ничего не чтят, ник-каких порядков!"

traits.locale_text: "The shooting does... the attacks on noble folk — not very often... Unless it's Anvers. Those are vicious, a week can't go by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics, they respect nothing, f-follow no rules!"

"The shooting does... the attacks on noble folk — not very often... Unless it's Anvers. Those are vicious, a week can't go by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics, they respect nothing, f-follow no rules!"

"Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

"Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

"Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

languages.text: 「銃撃なら…貴族に対する攻撃は珍しいですが…アンヴァースであれば話は別です。奴らは残虐です。奴らによる殺人は毎週のように起きています。と、とんでもない異端者どもです。何も恐れず、どんな規則にも従いません！」
languages.original_text: "Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

traits.locale_text: 「銃撃なら…貴族に対する攻撃は珍しいですが…アンヴァースであれば話は別です。奴らは残虐です。奴らによる殺人は毎週のように起きています。と、とんでもない異端者どもです。何も恐れず、どんな規則にも従いません！」

languages.text: “枪击的话，确实如此……可针对贵族的袭击，并不常发生……除非是安维尔帮干的。他们凶狠残暴，每周都要杀人，把别人开膛破肚。他们是邪恶的异……异端分子。他们毫无敬畏之心，他们……他们简直是无法无天！”
languages.original_text: "Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

traits.locale_text: “枪击的话，确实如此……可针对贵族的袭击，并不常发生……除非是安维尔帮干的。他们凶狠残暴，每周都要杀人，把别人开膛破肚。他们是邪恶的异……异端分子。他们毫无敬畏之心，他们……他们简直是无法无天！”

languages.text: «Disparos, sí... Asaltos a nobles, no tantos... A menos que sean los Anvers; esos sí que son mezquinos. No hay semana que pase sin un asesinato o desmembramiento suyo. Son unos h-herejes de cuidado. No respetan nada. ¡N-no siguen las normas!».
languages.original_text: "Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

traits.locale_text: «Disparos, sí... Asaltos a nobles, no tantos... A menos que sean los Anvers; esos sí que son mezquinos. No hay semana que pase sin un asesinato o desmembramiento suyo. Son unos h-herejes de cuidado. No respetan nada. ¡N-no siguen las normas!».

languages.text: « Des fusillades, oui... mais les attaques sur la noblesse, c'est assez rare... sauf quand il s'agit des Anver. Ils sont horribles. Il ne se passe pas une semaine sans qu'ils tuent quelqu'un et qu'ils l'étripent. Ce sont d'infâmes hé... hérétiques. Ils ne respectent rien. Ils n-n'obéissent à aucune règle ! »
languages.original_text: "Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

traits.locale_text: « Des fusillades, oui... mais les attaques sur la noblesse, c'est assez rare... sauf quand il s'agit des Anver. Ils sont horribles. Il ne se passe pas une semaine sans qu'ils tuent quelqu'un et qu'ils l'étripent. Ce sont d'infâmes hé... hérétiques. Ils ne respectent rien. Ils n-n'obéissent à aucune règle ! »

languages.text: "Schießereien schon ... Angriffe auf Adlige eher weniger ... Außer durch die Anvers. Die sind bösartig. Es vergeht keine Woche, ohne dass sie jemanden töten und ausweiden. Das sind schlimme K-Ketzer. Sie respektieren nichts. Sie akzeptieren k-keine Regeln!"
languages.original_text: "Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

traits.locale_text: "Schießereien schon ... Angriffe auf Adlige eher weniger ... Außer durch die Anvers. Die sind bösartig. Es vergeht keine Woche, ohne dass sie jemanden töten und ausweiden. Das sind schlimme K-Ketzer. Sie respektieren nichts. Sie akzeptieren k-keine Regeln!"

languages.text: "Silahlı saldırılar evet. Soylulara saldırılara ise çok rastlanmaz. Tabii Anver değillerse. Onlar vahşidir. Huzur verdikleri bir hafta bile yoktur, illa birini öldürüp bağırsaklarını dökerler. Alayı gözü dönmüş kâfirdir. Hiçbir şeye saygı duymaz, ku... Kural falan tanımazlar."
languages.original_text: "Shooting, yes... Attacks on nobles, not very often... Unless it's the Anvers. They're vicious. Not a week goes by without them killing and gutting somebody. They're wicked h-heretics. They respect nothing. They f-follow no rules!"

traits.locale_text: "Silahlı saldırılar evet. Soylulara saldırılarsa çok sık olmaz. Tabii Anverlar değillerse. Onlar vahşidirler. Birini öldürüp iç organlarını dökmedikleri bir hafta bile geçmez. Kötülük peşindeki birer kâfirdirler. Hiçbir şeye saygıları yoktur. Hiçbir ku... Kurala uymazlar!"
